explains: n. （Farmer）（英）法默；（法）法尔梅；（西）法梅尔（人名）
wordGroup: dairy farmer 奶农；畜牧工人

sentences.en: There once was a poor farmer who had four sons.
sentences.cn: 从前有一个贫苦的农夫，他有四个儿子。

sentences.en: A farmer is entitled to a certain particularized tax treatment.
sentences.cn: 农民能够享受某种具体的税收待遇。

sentences.en: At first glance, organic farming looks much more expensive for the farmer.
sentences.cn: 乍一看，有机耕作对农民来说似乎昂贵得多。
